body: Just cut the hetero scene and this is perfect
Oh boy a casual smash discussion in my favorite smash website! Personally I prefer the air.
samus is still best.  Smack them around and charge shot for the finisher
Captain falcon would need a serious re-work in skill sets to match up with the newer, more versatile characters (marth main)

My bad, I was referring directly to his recovery. It seems very linear, which makes me think that he is useless against many characters that he can't combo, like jigglypuff, since they can kill him the instant he gets offstage
Well, he was part of the Original 12...
Who here thinks that Captain Falcon is a viable character in Super Smash Bros. Melee?
